data.Name: Appraise
data.Description: A Business Intention of Appraise refers to a well drilled into a formation shown to be potentially productive by an earlier well and is used to obtain more information about the reservoir.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Develop
data.Description: A Business Intention of Develop refers to a well drilled into an area or zone already proven to be productive, in order to assist in the recovery of hydrocarbons. This includes service wells.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Explore
data.Description: A Business Intention of Explore refers to a well drilled to determine and evaluate the hydrocarbon potential of a previously undeveloped area or zone.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Extend
data.Description: A Business Intention of Extend refers to a well drilled to determine the continuation of a known pool or to find a nearby pool in the same formation.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).

data.Name: Re-acquire
data.Description: A well drilled to intersect another well for the purpose of extending the utility of a well whose surface borehole has been lost or damaged.
data.Source: Workbook curated by PPDM; commit SHA - No SHA (Workbook not committed).
